article_title: Tough times lie ahead for Europe’s airlines
article_text: European airlines are set for some major turbulence in the coming  months, according to analysts, who predict the Brexit vote and  terrorism will impact consumer demand.“It’s a tough time for airlines at the moment,” Andrew  Lobbenberg, airlines analyst at HSBC, told CNBC Monday.“You shouldn’t underestimate the impacts that were going on  anyway of rising capacity in the airline industry putting fares  under pressure.”
